review: Its nice to finally be able to see what's on my phone on a big screen. No loss of quality in audio or video. Everyone should have one of these.
author: Mendel Jaffe

review: The very best. I use my tablet as a remote for Google music and play this through my denon receiver. Flawless, I bought 3 of them for all f my TV's.

review: I love it ☺️ Easy to use!

review: Love this item a lot it's a lot cheaper however it has a few glitches. Soemtimes the device is undetectable to my other devices.

review: Great price. Easy to set up and use. What a great product.

review: Great gadget especially fro old LCS TVs (not smart TV)
